    • updateOrderItem

      @PostMapping("/updateOrderItem") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateOrderItem(@RequestParam("id") Long id, @Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid OrderItemDTO orderItemDTO)
      Updates an existing order item.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order item to update
      orderItemDTO - The updated OrderItemDTO containing the new order item data
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated OrderItemDTO if successful, or HTTP status NOT_FOUND if order item not found

      @PostMapping("/deleteOrderItem") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteOrderItem(@RequestParam("id") Long id)
      Deletes an existing order item.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order item to delete
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status OK if successful, or HTTP status NOT_FOUND if order item not found
